metadata.title: CVE-2020-26682 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In libass 0.14.0, the `ass_outline_construct`'s call to `outline_stroke`causes a signed integer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-26682` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libass9 - 1:0.15.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libass package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.15.2-1').
